entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 03:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -30.6°C
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -33.5°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
